ol.li: Easily create powerful, story-telling dashboards with advanced visualization tools.
Efficiently build dashboards with a streamlined editing experience and fully customizable formats.
Empower more dashboard creators and users to get hands on with no custom code required.

html.p: Formerly known as the popular Dashboard Beta App on Splunkbase, Dashboard Studio will now be integrated directly into Search & Reporting and you can now enjoy two dashboard editor options - Classic Dashboards (our traditional Simple XML dashboards) and Dashboard Studio. Aspects of this dashboarding framework can also be experienced in ITSIâ€™s Glass Tables and Mission Control.

p.strong: Key Features Similar to Simple XML include

ol.li: Data & Searches: Support for in-line searches, saved searches (reports), and base/post-process searches
Visualizations: Standard charts like line, area, bar, column, pie, gauges, tables, maps, etc...
Inputs: Time range picker, selection lists, text boxes.
Tokens: Set tokens from inputs that dynamically update the dashboard.
Examples: Examples of visualization configurations, data source options, complete dashboards and more.
UI Editor & Source Code Editor: improved UI editor, and modern JSON source code.
Flexible layouts: Absolute layout for full control of positioning, layering, and sizing. Grid layout for snap-to alignment and panel resizing.
More objects: Support for images, icons, shapes, lines, and text boxes.
On-demand export to PNG/PDF: While maintaining the look & feel of the dashboard!
Dashboard defaults: Set visualization options or query parameters once to apply across your dashboard.
Choropleth SVG: Upload custom images that are responsive to data.
Editor shortcuts & bulk actions: Multi-select objects and align, resize, rearrange, or layer.

html.p: For more information on using some of these new cool features, refer to this blog post and check out the Splunk Dashboard Studio manual.
